Detailed Description

Abstract base class for readers, see StandardReader (and its subclasses) for implementation.

A reader is used for handling incoming messages to a module. Different behaviour depending on whether the module is leader or not. The voting procedure and all control-messages (the CTRL_PACKET_BIT is set) are taken care of here.
